data.text: @Cyresy_10 @TorontoStar Perhaps alternate 5 minute miles with 12 minute miles. yuk yuk yuk - #Plogging is fun. @stfxuniversity @CoadyStFX @litterati Download Litterati use this code: worldhug to join me in this challenge: #WorldLitterRun . Download the app here: https://t.co/34bXUTlU9q https://t.co/iyjkzCV6SQ
@DrMichaelDMeht1 @TorontoStar @thompsonriversu Might be a good idea. Not many papers on “digital environmental studies” out there yet
@Cyresy_10 @TorontoStar Looks interesting Alex! I've planted the seed a few times at @thompsonriversu that we should build a digital twin of our campus in the metaverse.

@Cyresy_10 @TorontoStar I just read your latest article in the Star on Metaverse / Realeatate. #Metaverses. I would like to learn more about this new world. Can I hire a consultant to discus this with at professional level with fee based assignment? Please advise.
@LukeShoeFitter @TorontoStar Too bad, because I think Decentraland might need somebody to pick up virtual litter😉

@Cyresy_10 @TorontoStar Congratulations Alex, I’m having a hard time making it around the real world, I don’t think I’ll I need to add another dimension. I’m going to read this during a time when my brain quiet.
